Posts.Content: I couldn't agree more!  Our food has so many additives in it we have to be careful.  Loved your post!
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer/ with no treatment

Posts.Content: I did a lot of research and found the Cantin Ketogenic Diet by Elaine Cantin.  I would recommend anyone with cancer to read and understand the science and what feeds cancer.  I did not take the Arimidex as I feel it can do more harm!  How did we get cancer to begin with?  What are we eating - what is our lifestyle?  Those are the things we should be addressing.  Doing nothing without research and education would be foolish of course.
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer/ with no treatment

Posts.Content: I had a lumpectomy followed by 1 week of radiation twice per day.  My lump was stage 1 and they got clean edges when it was removed.  I opted to forego the chemo drug Arimadex.  The side efftects seemed much worse than getting the breast cancer.  I then found a book by Elaine Cantin called "The Cantin Ketogenic Diet".  I am getting ready to go on it again for 4 weeks and highly recommend you reading it.  One thing that bothered me was there was no mention of diet or watching sugar in your diet.  Cancer feeds on glucose!  Do your research and I wish you the best!
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer/ with no treatment

Posts.Content: Sounds great!  Check out the Cantin Ketogenic Diet book by Elaine Cantin.  It has some of the same actions that you are incorporating.  I found it really enlightening.  Congrats on your success!  So happy to hear I am not the only one going against the majority.  I have a friend who is pre-menopausal so she is on Tamoxifen and is experiencing side effects.  eek!  Scary!
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer/ with no treatment

Posts.Content: Please read the Cantin Ketogenic Diet book by Elaine Cantin.  You may have hope of a restored life!  Just want to encourage you.  :)
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer/ with no treatment

Posts.Content: Hilde, Said a prayer for you and will continue.  Sorry to hear that.....Please keep me updated. Sue
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer/ with no treatment

Posts.Content: Hilde, I read that post.  I chuckled at veneralbe too.  I didn't write it however and you replied to me.  I am with you!  You try anything to help your situation.  Just wanted to make sure you knew that wasn't from me. Sue
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer/ with no treatment

Posts.Content: Did you strictly adhere to the Cantin Ketogenic Diet or was it another type?
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer/ with no treatment

Posts.Content: Hilde, Your attitude is very admirable.  I have heard of Gerson diet and some people have good results with that.  I was curious if you tried the "Cantin Ketogenic Diet"?  Elaine Cantin developed  this for herself and many have been helped by it.  Thank you for your email and I will pray for your recovery. Sue
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer/ with no treatment

Posts.Content: My heart goes out to you.  You have certainly been through a lot!  So sorry....I know it must have been difficult.  As you have read, my case was very mild and I am thankful for that.  God is my rock and scripture continues to walk me through everything.  I am very thankful for the excellent medical treatment I received, but feel there are many other factors to consider.  As with everything sometimes you find money drives certain recommendations etc.  I hate to say that.....but praying and making an educated decision were my two important actions.  :)
